actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide that any person who pays any compensation to an illegal alien shall be subject to a criminal fine.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to make it a petty offense for any individual to pay compensation to an alien whom such person knows to be an alien not lawfully admitted to the United States. Establishes a fine of not more than $100 for each alien with respect to whom any violation occurs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide that any person who pays any compensation to an illegal alien shall be subject to a criminal fine.
